EmailTemplate.description: Contact owner and partner contact should receive a notification one week before it expires and then again on the day that it expires
EmailTemplate.name: 7A. Partner Opportunity Expiration Notification
EmailTemplate.subject: Adaptive Insights Opportunity Registration
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Opportunity.Partner_Contact__c}, Your opportunity registration for {!Opportunity.Primary_Contact__c} and {!Opportunity.Account} is about to expire, as we have not received any activity updates from you. If you are continuing to pursue this prospect, please document your activities on the opportunity as a task through the Partner Community, within the next week. You can log a task by clicking on the opportunity name, click on Related tab and click new task. To view the Opportunity, click here: {!Opportunity.Link} The Adaptive Insights Channel Team
Follow us!
